column4: suggest you read https://help.ubuntu.com/community/ReportingBugs and install rosegarden-dbgsym package.  Then try and submit some bug reports
It's something you can do to help the developers improve the software that you value
sorry it's not a fix for you but it will be appreciated by the devs hopefuily :)
I favour amarok, but it is a kde app so will use a bit more resources as it loads kde libs.  On a modern PC, you wont notice.  It's awesome if you have a big collection you need to tame
